      • modifyVirtualMachineTemplate

        protected VirtualMachineTemplate modifyVirtualMachineTemplate(VirtualMachineTemplate originalMachineTemplate)
        Extension point for the virtual machine template. Allows the subclass to replace the virtual machine template before it is passed to the jclouds template builder.
        Parameters:
        originalMachineTemplate - the virtual machine template to modify
        Returns:
        the replaced template

      • modifyTemplateOptions

        protected org.jclouds.compute.options.TemplateOptions modifyTemplateOptions(VirtualMachineTemplate originalVirtualMachineTemplate,
                                                                            org.jclouds.compute.options.TemplateOptions originalTemplateOptions)
        Extension point for the template options. Allows the subclass to replace the jclouds template options object with a new one before it is passed to the template builder.
        Parameters:
        originalVirtualMachineTemplate - the original virtual machine template
        originalTemplateOptions - the original template options
        Returns:
        the replaced template options.
